name: Batman vs Superman - Angular 2 Superhero Demo
body:
## Welcome
This is a simple voting app created with AngularJS 2.0.0-alpha.45, Firebase and Materialize CSS.

## Demo
You can see the application in action in this [Demo](https://batmanvsupermanapp.com).

![Preview](http://annatomka.github.io/public/bvs_statistics.png)

## Installation

Install dependencies:

```
$ npm install 
```

Build project: 

```
$ gulp
```

## How to use

Compile code and watch for changes: 
```
$ npm run tsc
```

Start local http server run the following command in the root directory of the application: 

```
$ npm start
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
